front.title: RTP Payload Format for Generic FEC-Encoded Time-Sensitive Media

abstract.t: This document describes a RTP payload format for streams that have been encoded using Forward Error Correction (FEC), for enhanced reliability. The FEC encoding scheme is assumed to be an instantiation of the "FEC Building Block" defined in RFC 3452, and packets and parameters defined for the encoding scheme are used directly as corresponding RTP payloads and parameters.
